sqlMap.select: select sum(t1.total) as notPay , t3.name as creditName, t2.id as cid , t2.name as cname,t2.code as ccode, t2.creditVal as creditVal from t_center_out t1, T_CENTER_CUSTOMER_NOW t2 , t_center_credit_level t3 where t2.id = t1.customerId and t1.pay = 0 and t1.type = 0 and t1.status in (3, 4) and t1.outTime >= #outTime# and t3.id = t2.creditLevelId GROUP by t1.customerId ORDER by notPay desc
